cause.description:
Here at "Support Pre-marital sex" we believe that younger people having sexual activities exposes them to the real world, thus allowing them to adjust and get use to the responsibility of having sex. Also to prevent the growing population of bitter old virgins who like to ruin fun for younger generations.
1. Sex is a universal right.
2. Sodemy is the way to go.
3. Skin to skin or dont go in.
cause.mission: Get more Teens to Sex it Up!
cause.name: Support Pre-marital Sex
